verses.verse: בְּרֵאשִׁ֗ית <WH7225> In the beginning מַמְלְכ֛וּת <WH4468> of the reign יְהוֹיָקִ֥ים <WH3079> of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֖הוּ <WH2977> of Josiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah הָיָה֙ <WH1961> came הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> came this word הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> from the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD עֲמֹד֮ <WH5975> Stand בַּחֲצַ֣ר <WH2691> in the court בֵּית־ <WH1004> house יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> of the LORD'S וְדִבַּרְתָּ֞ <WH1696> and speak עַל־ <WH5921> unto כָּל־ <WH3605> all עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> unto all the cities יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah הַבָּאִים֙ <WH935> which come לְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֣ת <WH7812> to worship בֵּית־ <WH1004> house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> in the LORD'S אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> all the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> i צִוִּיתִ֖יךָ <WH6680> that I command לְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> thee to speak אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH413> about אַל־ <WH408> not תִּגְרַ֖ע <WH1639> unto them diminish דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> not a word

אוּלַ֣י <WH194> Perhaps יִשְׁמְע֔וּ <WH8085> If so be they will hearken וְיָשֻׁ֕בוּ <WH7725> and turn אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every man מִדַּרְכּ֣וֹ <WH1870> way הָרָעָ֑ה <WH7451> from his evil וְנִחַמְתִּ֣י <WH5162> that I may repent אֶל־ <WH413> from הָרָעָ֗ה <WH7451> me of the evil אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֤י <WH595> I חֹשֵׁב֙ <WH2803> which I purpose לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to do לָהֶ֔ם מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> unto them because רֹ֥עַ <WH7455> of the evil מַעַלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4611> of their doings

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> And thou shalt say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> to כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD אִם־ <WH518> If לֹ֤א <WH3808> you will not תִשְׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> If ye will not hearken אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <WH1980> walk בְּת֣וֹרָתִ֔י <WH8451> in my law אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> which I have set לִפְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH6440> before

לִשְׁמֹ֗עַ <WH8085> To hearken עַל־ <WH5921> unto דִּבְרֵ֨י <WH1697> to the words עֲבָדַ֣י <WH5650> of my servants הַנְּבִאִ֔ים <WH5030> the prophets אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I שֹׁלֵ֣חַ <WH7971> whom I sent אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH413> to you וְהַשְׁכֵּ֥ם <WH7925> unto you both rising up early וְשָׁלֹ֖חַ <WH7971> and sending וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> have not שְׁמַעְתֶּֽם׃ <WH8085> [them] but ye have not hearkened

וְנָתַתִּ֛י <WH5414> Then will I make אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּ֥יִת <WH1004> this house הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this כְּשִׁלֹ֑ה <WH7887> like Shiloh וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֤יר <WH5892> this city [הַזֹּאתָה כ] (הַזֹּאת֙ <WH2063> likewise ק) אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> and will make לִקְלָלָ֔ה <WH7045> a curse לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> to all גּוֹיֵ֥י <WH1471> to all the nations הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth ס

וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֛וּ <WH8085> heard הַכֹּהֲנִ֥ים <WH3548> So the priests וְהַנְּבִאִ֖ים <WH5030> and the prophets וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> and all the people אֶֽת־ <WH853> יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah מְדַבֵּ֛ר <WH1696> speaking אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> these words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> become כְּכַלּ֣וֹת <WH3615> had made an end יִרְמְיָ֗הוּ <WH3414> Now it came to pass when Jeremiah לְדַבֵּר֙ <WH1696> of speaking אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> had commanded יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> all that the LORD לְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> [him] to speak אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> unto all the people וַיִּתְפְּשׂ֨וּ <WH8610> took אֹת֜וֹ <WH853> הַכֹּהֲנִ֧ים <WH3548> that the priests וְהַנְּבִאִ֛ים <WH5030> and the prophets וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> and all the people לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> him saying מ֥וֹת <WH4191> Thou shalt surely תָּמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> die

מַדּוּעַ֩ <WH4069> Why נִבֵּ֨יתָ <WH5012> Why hast thou prophesied בְשֵׁם־ <WH8034> in the name יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying כְּשִׁלוֹ֙ <WH7887> shall be like Shiloh יִֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> become הַבַּ֣יִת <WH1004> This house הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> This וְהָעִ֥יר <WH5892> and this city הַזֹּ֛את <WH2063> likewise תֶּחֱרַ֖ב <WH2717> shall be desolate מֵאֵ֣ין <WH369> without יוֹשֵׁ֑ב <WH3427> without an inhabitant וַיִּקָּהֵ֧ל <WH6950> were gathered כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> ? And all the people אֶֽל־ <WH413> about יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> against Jeremiah בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֣וּ ׀ <WH8085> heard שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> When the princes יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah אֵ֚ת <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> then they came up מִבֵּית־ <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> from the king's בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> unto the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֵּֽשְׁב֛וּ <WH3427> and sat down בְּפֶ֥תַח <WH6607> in the entry שַֽׁעַר־ <WH8179> gate יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD'S הֶחָדָֽשׁ׃ <WH2319> of the new ס

וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <WH559> Then spake הַכֹּהֲנִ֤ים <WH3548> the priests וְהַנְּבִאִים֙ <WH5030> and the prophets אֶל־ <WH413> against הַשָּׂרִ֔ים <WH8269> unto the princes וְאֶל־ <WH413> against כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and to all the people לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying מִשְׁפַּט־ <WH4941> [is] worthy מָ֙וֶת֙ <WH4194> to die לָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> This man הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this כִּ֤י <WH3588> for נִבָּא֙ <WH5012> for he hath prophesied אֶל־ <WH413> against הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> against this city הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> as כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH8085> as ye have heard בְּאָזְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH241> with your ears

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> Then spake יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH3414> Jeremiah אֶל־ <WH413> against כָּל־ <WH3605> to all הַשָּׂרִ֔ים <WH8269> unto all the princes וְאֶל־ <WH413> and against כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and to all the people לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> The LORD שְׁלָחַ֗נִי <WH7971> sent לְהִנָּבֵ֞א <WH5012> me to prophesy אֶל־ <WH413> and against הַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> against this house הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this וְאֶל־ <WH413> and against הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> and against this city הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> all the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you שְׁמַעְתֶּֽם׃ <WH8085> that ye have heard

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now הֵיטִ֤יבוּ <WH3190> Therefore now amend דַרְכֵיכֶם֙ <WH1870> your ways וּמַ֣עַלְלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH4611> and your doings וְשִׁמְע֕וּ <WH8085> and obey בְּק֖וֹל <WH6963> the voice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> your God וְיִנָּחֵ֣ם <WH5162> will repent יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> and the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> about הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> him of the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> that he hath pronounced עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5921> against

וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> I הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> I am in בְיֶדְכֶ֑ם <WH3027> As for me behold I [am] in your hand עֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> do לִ֛י כַּטּ֥וֹב <WH2896> good וְכַיָּשָׁ֖ר <WH3477> and meet בְּעֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5869> with me as seemeth

אַ֣ךְ ׀ <WH389> Only יָדֹ֣עַ <WH3045> But know תֵּדְע֗וּ <WH3045> ye for certain כִּ֣י <WH3588> that אִם־ <WH518> if מְמִתִ֣ים <WH4191> that if ye put me to death אַתֶּם֮ <WH859> you אֹתִי֒ <WH853> כִּי־ <WH3588> for דָ֣ם <WH1818> blood נָקִ֗י <WH5355> innocent אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you נֹתְנִ֣ים <WH5414> ye shall surely bring עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> and וְאֶל־ <WH413> about הָעִ֥יר <WH5892> upon yourselves and upon this city הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise וְאֶל־ <WH413> and on יֹשְׁבֶ֑יהָ <WH3427> and upon the inhabitants כִּ֣י <WH3588> for בֶאֱמֶ֗ת <WH571> thereof for of a truth שְׁלָחַ֤נִי <WH7971> hath sent יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> to you לְדַבֵּר֙ <WH1696> me unto you to speak בְּאָזְנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH241> in your ears אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> all these words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these ס

וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <WH559> Then said הַשָּׂרִים֙ <WH8269> the princes וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> and all the people אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> unto the priests וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to הַנְּבִיאִ֑ים <WH5030> and to the prophets אֵין־ <WH369> No לָאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> This man הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this מִשְׁפַּט־ <WH4941> [is] not worthy מָ֔וֶת <WH4194> to die כִּ֗י <WH3588> in בְּשֵׁ֛ם <WH8034> to us in the name יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> our God דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> for he hath spoken אֵלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH413> about

וַיָּקֻ֣מוּ <WH6965> Then rose up אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH582> certain מִזִּקְנֵ֖י <WH2205> of the elders הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and spake אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all קְהַ֥ל <WH6951> to all the assembly הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> of the people לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

[מִיכָיָהּ כ] (מִיכָה֙ <WH4320> Micah ק) הַמּ֣וֹרַשְׁתִּ֔י <WH4183> the Morasthite הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> will become נִבָּ֔א <WH5012> prophesied בִּימֵ֖י <WH3117> in the days חִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH2396> of Hezekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and spake אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַם֩ <WH5971> to all the people יְהוּדָ֨ה <WH3063> of Judah לֵאמֹ֜ר <WH559> saying כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <WH6635> of hosts צִיּ֞וֹן <WH6726> Zion שָׂדֶ֤ה <WH7704> [like] a field תֵֽחָרֵשׁ֙ <WH2790> shall be plowed וִירוּשָׁלַ֙יִם֙ <WH3389> and Jerusalem עִיִּ֣ים <WH5856> shall become heaps תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> will become וְהַ֥ר <WH2022> and the mountain הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> of the house לְבָמ֥וֹת <WH1116> as the high places יָֽעַר׃ <WH3293> of a forest

הֶהָמֵ֣ת <WH4191> put him at all הֱ֠מִתֻהוּ <WH4191> to death חִזְקִיָּ֨הוּ <WH2396> Did Hezekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> of Judah וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> and all Judah הֲלֹא֮ <WH3808> not יָרֵ֣א <WH3373> ? did he not fear אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> the LORD וַיְחַל֙ <WH2470> and besought אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> the favor יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> and the LORD וַיִּנָּ֣חֶם <WH5162> repented יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> and the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> about הָרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> him of the evil אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> which he had pronounced עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> against וַאֲנַ֗חְנוּ <WH587> against them? Thus עֹשִׂ֛ים <WH6213> might we procure רָעָ֥ה <WH7451> evil גְדוֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> great עַל־ <WH5921> against נַפְשׁוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5315> against our souls
